title: Fallen
description: “One of of [romance’s] brightest stars”( ROMANCE REVIEWS TODAY) shows off her dark side.Forever cursed.Forever FALLEN.New Orleans, 1840s. Sent to watch over the decadent city, the angel Gabriel loses himself in the liquid pleasure of absinthe. So when his mistress, Anne, is murdered—and all evidence points to him—a foggy Gabriel cannot be sure he didn’t do it. His to be forever denied love. Then in modern-day New Orleans he meets forensic scientist Sara Michaels...
author: Erin McCarthy
